title: Notepad++
description: Notepad++ is a lightweight code editor with syntax highlighting and other basic features for editing text and code.

title: VS Code IDE
description: VS Code is a versatile code editor used for writing and editing code in various programming languages.

title: Eclipse IDE
description: Eclipse IDE is a powerful integrated development environment for coding, debugging, and testing software.

title: Code Climate
description: Code Climate is a platform that provides automated code review and analytics to improve code quality and maintainability.

title: Adobe Dreamweaver
description: Adobe Dreamweaver is a comprehensive web development tool used for designing, coding, and managing websites and mobile content.

title: Digital Multimeter
description: A digital multimeter is a tool used to measure electrical properties like voltage, current, and resistance in electronic circuits.

title: Git
description: Git is used for version control, allowing multiple developers to collaborate on projects by tracking changes to files.

title: Screwdrivers
description: Screwdrivers are tools used for tightening or loosening screws by turning them with a rotating blade or tip.

title: Soldering Iron
description: A soldering iron is a tool used to melt solder, which is a metal alloy, to join two or more metal surfaces together.

title: Voltage Tester
description: Voltage testers are tools used to check the presence or absence of electrical voltage in a circuit or electrical device.

title: Oscilloscope
description: An oscilloscope is a device used to graphically display and analyze the waveform of electronic signals, typically voltage, over time.

title: Wire Strippers
description: Wire strippers are tools used to remove the insulation from the ends of electrical wires to expose the metal conductor for connections.

title: John the Ripper
description: John the Ripper is a widely used password cracking tool that can help identify weak passwords in a system by attempting various password combinations.

title: Nmap
description: Nmap is a powerful network scanning tool used to discover hosts and services on a computer network, thus creating a map of the network.

title: Firewalls
description: Firewalls are security systems that monitor and control incoming and outgoing network traffic based on predetermined security rules.

title: Kali Linux
description: Kali Linux is a Debian-based Linux distribution designed for digital forensics and penetration testing.
